Equipment Actions.Action 1: Morningstar, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 12 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Javelin, Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft or 30/120ft, Average Damage: 10 Piercing or 6 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Bugbear Chief makes 2 melee attacks

Abilities.Ability 1: Brute, A melee weapon deals one extra die of damage when the Bugbear Chief hits (included above, whoops, not going back ;)
Abilities.Ability 2: Heart of Hruggek, The Bugbear Chief has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, stunned, or put to sleep
Abilities.Ability 3: Surprise Attack, If the Bugbear Chief surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes extra damage
